name: Diabolical Trivia 2: Escape Room
description:
Hamish Scragglethorpe (World Trivia Champion 1932-1987) has kidnapped you! You may be able to escape by taking advantage of his poor memory and love of obscure facts, but will you manage?

While technically a sequel to my previous game, you do not need to have played DT1 to understand this. DT2 is a short escape room made in twine, the answers can be found in game, but are all based on real facts.

If you enjoyed this game you can support me here; https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Vullinius
